title: Zebras in America
description: Harry and his family are half human, half zebra. The people in Africa hated them and the zebras did too. So they move to America where life isn’t perfect either.
altHero: a family of half human, half zebra centaurs approach the Statue of Liberty via boat
alt2: zebras turning up their noses at the zebra centaur family
alt3: a sign that reads “Humans only. No centaurs!”
alt4: two of the zebra centaurs eating the lawn outside a house, a neighbor looks on confused
